title: Tyga Appears To Call Kylie Jenner a Liar Over Her Rendezvous Denial
text:
Tyga seems to be responding to Kylie Jenners denial she met up with him following her breakup from Travis Scott.

Earlier today, Kylie took to Twitter today to respond to photos, which reportedly showed her arriving to hang out with her ex, Tyga. The alleged rendezvous went down hours after her split was revealed

The reality star wrote, The internet makes everything 100 times more dramatic than what it really is. There was no 2am date with Tyga. You see me drop two of my friends off at a studio that he happened to be at."

She continued, Travis and i are on great terms and our main focus right now is Stormi our friendship and our daughter is priority.

Tyga appears to have responded less than an hour after Jenner released her statement. He took to social media.

He simply posted a blue hat (cap) emoji, which can symbolize someone is lying. The timing is leading to many fans thinking hes talking about Kylie.

The internet makes everything 100 times more dramatic than what it really is. There was no “2am date with Tyga”. You see me drop two of my friends off at a studio that he happened to be at.

— Kylie Jenner (@KylieJenner) October 3, 2019

As The Blast reported, Kylie and Travis are taking some time apart after several years together.

We're told they've "broke up and gotten back together several times" within the last few weeks, and are trying to figure out if a permanent breakup is what they want.

Travis and i are on great terms and our main focus right now is Stormi ‼️ our friendship and our daughter is priority

— Kylie Jenner (@KylieJenner) October 3, 2019

In regards to custody of their daughter, our sources say the duo will share time with her 50/50.

This is the first time that either one of them has addressed the breakup, although fans noticed several signs that alluded to trouble in paradise.
